description:
**This course is updated for 2016, and is guaranteed to give you optimal results !**

For many starting affiliate marketers, the industry can very very rough, and most of the times, things just don't work out.

Yet you know people just like you are hitting incredible paydays by selling products they don't own. How ?

Let it be said once and for all: Affiliate Marketing requires to be educated. You need to know about traffic sources, products you are trying to sell, and how to bridge both before you can think about making sales.

What if I told you I could give you this knowledge through this course, and help you make your first commission. After two years of affiliate marketing and many (many) failures, I got to learn what works, and what doesn't.

We'll start using free methods, and I'll teach you how to reinvest your earnings to build a business that works while you're out celebrating.

I will go even further: I will GUARANTEE your first commission in less than a week -and many more after that.

This course provides the blueprint to get your foot in the door of affiliate marketing and surely build your way to the top, while learning the bigger picture. This ensure you won't have to rely on the material in this course to keep going.

All of the tactics, scripts, and techniques are the product of my personal experience with this platform, my research, my discoveries and my advice. I went through months of testing so you won't have to.

Skeptical?

We have thaught over 13,000 students the ropes of internet marketing, ranging from flipping public domain content to creating compelling promotional videos. This is our passion.

A few of the things you'll learn in this course:

  1. How to quickly get setup, with all the tools you need to succeed. We're going pro from the very start.
  2. How to find profitable affiliate offers to promote.
  3. The exact strategy that allows you to get banner advertising on popular websites, for free.
  4. My blueprint to find instantly profitable placements.
  5. How to scale your campaigns to steady income.

Trust me, this is just a small sample of what you'll learn and by the end of this course you'll have the ingredients to make affiliate marketing your kingdom.

I will personally respond to any questions you may have as you go through the material, inside the member's area. I will help you setup your campaigns. I have been known to spend hours on Skype to help students, and I will gladly do so for you, if need be.

Also, this course comes with an unbreakable 30-days money back guarantee. If you don't like our course (won't happen), click a button, and your money back

Sounds good ? Enroll now and let's get started already !

To your success,

Howard Lynch
title: Complete Beginners Guide to Affiliate Marketing That Works
